rule.descr: Allow Home Assistant to control IoT devices
Allow LAN to LAN traffic (local routing)
Default allow LAN to any rule
Default allow LAN IPv6 to any rule
Allow DNS queries to local DNS servers
Allow Home Assistant to control IoT devices
Allow IoT devices to push data to Home Assistant
Block IoT access to all private networks
Allow IoT devices to access internet
